javadoc: Defines methods for flow as if the code were actually being disassembled.

methods.name: process
methods.comment: Process this instruction; return false if instr terminates.

return.comment: false when the processing should stop

methods.name: followFlows
methods.comment: Return true if the flows should be followed from this instruction

return.comment: false if flows should not be followed

name: PseudoFlowProcessor
comment: Defines methods for flow as if the code were actually being disassembled.
